messages.message:
Hi team,
As part of EPD-1959 (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1959), I am working on ideas to make our deployments faster and efficient.
I created this google doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gmIwdwtxbKdWJ8M9Ww26Dxj-fpiTakaDbFe6EWDzaKA/edit?tab=t.0) to discuss and track the ideas. The document doesn't have the exhaustive list and will be a live document.
I would need help from engineering folks who have more context about specific areas, but overall, feel free to comment/suggest anything you think would help.
@Ashwin @Cody Boggs can you folks help answer questions related to Mesh manager in the doc?
